get.description: Lists all the HDInsight clusters under the subscription.

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The HDInsight client API Version.
parameters.name: api-version

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

type.description: The type of the resource.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

items.description: The HDInsight cluster.

identity.description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

principalId.description: The principal id of cluster identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the cluster. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: The type of identity used for the cluster. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the cluster. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

componentVersion.description: The versions of different services in the cluster.

roles.description: The list of roles in the cluster.

items.description: Describes a role on the cluster.

dataDisksGroups.description: The data disks groups for the role.

items.description: The data disks groups for the role.

diskSizeGB.description: ReadOnly. The DiskSize in GB. Do not set this value.

disksPerNode.description: The number of disks per node.

storageAccountType.description: ReadOnly. The storage account type. Do not set this value.

minInstanceCount.description: The minimum instance count of the cluster.

publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys.

items.description: The SSH public key for the cluster nodes.

scriptActions.description: The list of script actions on the role.

items.description: Describes a script action on role on the cluster.

name.description: The name of the script action.

parameters.description: The parameters for the script provided.

targetInstanceCount.description: The instance count of the cluster.

id.description: The ID of the virtual network.

items.description: The connectivity properties

createdDate.description: The date on which the cluster was created.

encryptionAlgorithm.description: Algorithm identifier for encryption, default RSA-OAEP.

keyName.description: Key name that is used for enabling disk encryption.

keyVersion.description: Specific key version that is used for enabling disk encryption.

msiResourceId.description: Resource ID of Managed Identity that is used to access the key vault.

vaultUri.description: Base key vault URI where the customers key is located eg. https://myvault.vault.azure.net

items.description: The error message associated with the cluster creation.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

coresUsed.description: The cores used by the cluster.

aaddsResourceId.description: The resource ID of the user's Azure Active Directory Domain Service.

clusterUsersGroupDNs.description: Optional. The Distinguished Names for cluster user groups

domainUsername.description: The domain user account that will have admin privileges on the cluster.

ldapsUrls.description: The LDAPS protocol URLs to communicate with the Active Directory.

msiResourceId.description: User assigned identity that has permissions to read and create cluster-related artifacts in the user's AADDS.

organizationalUnitDN.description: The organizational unit within the Active Directory to place the cluster and service accounts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

type.description: The type of identity used for the cluster. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the cluster. domainUsername.description: The domain user account that will have admin privileges on the cluster.
